name: Isn't hard 2
description:
Now this game is in beta test. (Sorry for my English).  This game is a simple puzzle with a lot of various levels. There are different locations and unique mechanics.

Sometimes you can solve it in 30 seconds. Some doors switch when you look/don't look at a special block. Some doors are opened with breaking crystals. There are also usual buttons and blocks you need to move on them...  Nevertheless, you need  to collect all the coins from secret blocks and get to finish only. (But secret block may contain something that doesn't look like a coin)

What about liminal spaces and really hard patterns?

Also there will be convinient level editor. (Tutorial is on my YouTube channel)

Isn't hard 2 is absolutely free. Everyone will be able to whatch it's code and make own version!

P.S. There is a lot of bugs, because this project is too young. But it works!

Code: https://github.com/tankoman228/Isn-t-hard-2-code
